Moreover he said<S>559</S> unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, eat<S>398</S> that thou findest<S>4672</S>; eat<S>398</S> this roll<S>4039</S>, and go<S>3212</S> speak<S>1696</S> unto the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
So I opened<S>6605</S> my mouth<S>6310</S>, and he caused me to eat<S>398</S> that roll<S>4039</S>.
And he said<S>559</S> unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, cause thy belly<S>990</S> to eat<S>398</S>, and fill<S>4390</S> thy bowels<S>4578</S> with this roll<S>4039</S> that I give<S>5414</S> thee. Then did I eat<S>398</S> it; and it was in my mouth<S>6310</S> as honey<S>1706</S> for sweetness<S>4966</S>.
And he said<S>559</S> unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, go<S>3212</S>, get<S>935</S> thee unto the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and speak<S>1696</S> with my words<S>1697</S> unto them.
For thou art not sent<S>7971</S> to a people<S>5971</S> of a strange<S>6012</S> speech<S>8193</S> and of an hard<S>3515</S> language<S>3956</S>, but to the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; <sup>of a: Heb. deep of lip, and heavy of tongue</sup>
Not to many<S>7227</S> people<S>5971</S> of a strange<S>6012</S> speech<S>8193</S> and of an hard<S>3515</S> language<S>3956</S>, whose words<S>1697</S> thou canst not understand<S>8085</S>. Surely, had I sent<S>7971</S> thee to them, they would have hearkened<S>8085</S> unto thee. <sup>of a: Heb. deep of lip, and heavy of language</sup> <sup>Surely: or, If I had sent thee, etc. would they not have hearkened unto thee?</sup>
But the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> will<S>14</S> not hearken<S>8085</S> unto thee; for they will<S>14</S> not hearken<S>8085</S> unto me: for all the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> are impudent<S>2389</S> <S>4696</S> and hardhearted<S>7186</S> <S>3820</S>. <sup>impudent: Heb. stiff of forehead, and hard of heart</sup>
Behold, I have made<S>5414</S> thy face<S>6440</S> strong<S>2389</S> against<S>5980</S> their faces<S>6440</S>, and thy forehead<S>4696</S> strong<S>2389</S> against<S>5980</S> their foreheads<S>4696</S>.
As an adamant<S>8068</S> harder<S>2389</S> than flint<S>6864</S> have I made<S>5414</S> thy forehead<S>4696</S>: fear<S>3372</S> them not, neither be dismayed<S>2865</S> at their looks<S>6440</S>, though they be a rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>.
Moreover he said<S>559</S> unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, all my words<S>1697</S> that I shall speak<S>1696</S> unto thee receive<S>3947</S> in thine heart<S>3824</S>, and hear<S>8085</S> with thine ears<S>241</S>.
And go<S>3212</S>, get<S>935</S> thee to them of the captivity<S>1473</S>, unto the children<S>1121</S> of thy people<S>5971</S>, and speak<S>1696</S> unto them, and tell<S>559</S> them, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; whether they will hear<S>8085</S>, or whether they will forbear<S>2308</S>.
Then the spirit<S>7307</S> took me up<S>5375</S>, and I heard<S>8085</S> behind<S>310</S> me a voice<S>6963</S> of a great<S>1419</S> rushing<S>7494</S>, saying, Blessed<S>1288</S> be the glory<S>3519</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> from his place<S>4725</S>.
I heard also the noise<S>6963</S> of the wings<S>3671</S> of the living creatures<S>2416</S> that touched<S>5401</S> one<S>802</S> another<S>269</S>, and the noise<S>6963</S> of the wheels<S>212</S> over against<S>5980</S> them, and a noise<S>6963</S> of a great<S>1419</S> rushing<S>7494</S>. <sup>touched: Heb. kissed</sup>
So the spirit<S>7307</S> lifted me up<S>5375</S>, and took me away<S>3947</S>, and I went<S>3212</S> in bitterness<S>4751</S>, in the heat<S>2534</S> of my spirit<S>7307</S>; but the hand<S>3027</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> was strong<S>2388</S> upon me. <sup>in bitterness: Heb. bitter</sup> <sup>heat: Heb. hot anger</sup>
Then I came<S>935</S> to them of the captivity<S>1473</S> at Telabib<S>8512</S>, that dwelt<S>3427</S> by the river<S>5104</S> of Chebar<S>3529</S>, and I sat<S>3427</S> where they sat<S>3427</S>, and remained<S>3427</S> there astonished<S>8074</S> among<S>8432</S> them seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S>.
And it came to pass at the end<S>7097</S> of seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S>, that the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, I have made<S>5414</S> thee a watchman<S>6822</S> unto the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: therefore hear<S>8085</S> the word<S>1697</S> at my mouth<S>6310</S>, and give them warning<S>2094</S> from me.
When I say<S>559</S> unto the wicked<S>7563</S>, Thou shalt surely<S>4191</S> die<S>4191</S>; and thou givest him not warning<S>2094</S>, nor speakest<S>1696</S> to warn<S>2094</S> the wicked<S>7563</S> from his wicked<S>7563</S> way<S>1870</S>, to save his life<S>2421</S>; the same wicked<S>7563</S> man shall die<S>4191</S> in his iniquity<S>5771</S>; but his blood<S>1818</S> will I require<S>1245</S> at thine hand<S>3027</S>.
Yet if thou warn<S>2094</S> the wicked<S>7563</S>, and he turn<S>7725</S> not from his wickedness<S>7562</S>, nor from his wicked<S>7563</S> way<S>1870</S>, he shall die<S>4191</S> in his iniquity<S>5771</S>; but thou hast delivered<S>5337</S> thy soul<S>5315</S>.
Again<S>7725</S>, When a righteous<S>6662</S> man doth turn<S>7725</S> from his righteousness<S>6664</S>, and commit<S>6213</S> iniquity<S>5766</S>, and I lay<S>5414</S> a stumblingblock<S>4383</S> before<S>6440</S> him, he shall die<S>4191</S>: because thou hast not given him warning<S>2094</S>, he shall die<S>4191</S> in his sin<S>2403</S>, and his righteousness<S>6666</S> which he hath done<S>6213</S> shall not be remembered<S>2142</S>; but his blood<S>1818</S> will I require<S>1245</S> at thine hand<S>3027</S>. <sup>righteousness which: Heb. righteousnesses</sup>
Nevertheless if thou warn<S>2094</S> the righteous<S>6662</S> man, that the righteous<S>6662</S> sin<S>2398</S> not, and he doth not sin<S>2398</S>, he shall surely<S>2421</S> live<S>2421</S>, because he is warned<S>2094</S>; also thou hast delivered<S>5337</S> thy soul<S>5315</S>.
And the hand<S>3027</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> was there upon me; and he said<S>559</S> unto me, Arise<S>6965</S>, go forth<S>3318</S> into the plain<S>1237</S>, and I will there talk<S>1696</S> with thee.
Then I arose<S>6965</S>, and went forth<S>3318</S> into the plain<S>1237</S>: and, behold, the glory<S>3519</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> stood<S>5975</S> there, as the glory<S>3519</S> which I saw<S>7200</S> by the river<S>5104</S> of Chebar<S>3529</S>: and I fell<S>5307</S> on my face<S>6440</S>.
Then the spirit<S>7307</S> entered<S>935</S> into me, and set<S>5975</S> me upon my feet<S>7272</S>, and spake<S>1696</S> with me, and said<S>559</S> unto me, Go<S>935</S>, shut<S>5462</S> thyself within<S>8432</S> thine house<S>1004</S>.
But thou, O son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, behold, they shall put<S>5414</S> bands<S>5688</S> upon thee, and shall bind<S>631</S> thee with them, and thou shalt not go out<S>3318</S> among<S>8432</S> them:
And I will make thy tongue<S>3956</S> cleave<S>1692</S> to the roof of thy mouth<S>2441</S>, that thou shalt be dumb<S>481</S>, and shalt not be to them a reprover<S>376</S> <S>3198</S>: for they are a rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>. <sup>a reprover: Heb. a man reproving</sup>
But when I speak<S>1696</S> with<S>854</S> thee, I will open<S>6605</S> thy mouth<S>6310</S>, and thou shalt say<S>559</S> unto them, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; He that heareth<S>8085</S>, let him hear<S>8085</S>; and he that forbeareth<S>2310</S>, let him forbear<S>2308</S>: for they are a rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>.
